languages.text: "Прикажи в ближайшем порту нанять рабочих взамен пропавшим — и пусть старейшины не забывают о моей щедрости".

traits.locale_text: "Прикажи в ближайшем порту нанять рабочих взамен пропавшим — и пусть старейшины не забывают о моей щедрости".

languages.text: "Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."
languages.original_text: "Прикажи в ближайшем порту нанять рабочих взамен пропавшим — и пусть старейшины не забывают о моей щедрости".

traits.locale_text: "Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace the missing and let the elders not forget about my generosity."
"Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace the missing and let the elders not forget about my generosity."
"Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."
"Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."
"Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."

languages.text: “等到了下个合适的世界时，雇佣一些工人来代替那些失踪的人。要确保那些长老不会忘记我的慷慨。”
languages.original_text: "Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."

traits.locale_text: “等到了下个合适的世界时，雇佣一些工人来代替那些失踪的人。要确保那些长老不会忘记我的慷慨。”

languages.text: «Contrate trabajadores en el próximo mundo adecuado para sustituir a los desaparecidos y asegúrese de que los ancianos no olvidan mi generosidad».
languages.original_text: "Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."

traits.locale_text: «Contrate trabajadores en el próximo mundo adecuado para sustituir a los desaparecidos y asegúrese de que los ancianos no olvidan mi generosidad».

languages.text: "Stellen Sie auf der nächsten geeigneten Welt Arbeiter ein, um die fehlenden zu ersetzen, und sorgen Sie dafür, dass die Ältesten meine Großzügigkeit nicht vergessen."
languages.original_text: "Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."

traits.locale_text: "Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."

languages.text: « Recrutez des travailleurs sur le prochain monde habité pour remplacer les disparus et assurez-vous que les doyens n'oublient pas ma générosité. »
languages.original_text: "Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."

traits.locale_text: « Recrutez des travailleurs sur le prochain monde habité pour remplacer les disparus et assurez-vous que les doyens n'oublient pas ma générosité. »

languages.text: 「次の良さそうな惑星で行方不明者の代わりになる労働者を雇って、老人達に{mf|俺|私}の懐の深さを記憶に刻んでもらおう」
languages.original_text: "Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."

traits.locale_text: 「次の良さそうな惑星で行方不明者の代わりになる労働者を雇って、老人達に{mf|俺|私}の懐の深さを記憶に刻んでもらおう」

languages.text: "Kaybolanların yerini alması için bir sonraki uygun dünyada yeni işçiler kiralayın ve ihtiyarların cömertliğimi unutmadığından emin olun."
languages.original_text: "Hire workers on the next suitable world to replace those missing and ensure that the elders do not forget my generosity."
